name: df-hlg
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(chlg, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), copab(s2, s3, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), cfv(cbs, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s3), cfv(cbs, cv(s0)))), w3a(wne(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wo(wcel(cv(s2), co(cv(s1), cfv(citv, cv(s0)), cv(s3))), wcel(cv(s3), co(cv(s1), cfv(citv, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ hlG =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚Ü¶ { < s2, s3 > |((s2 ‚àà(Base ` s0)‚àß s3 ‚àà(Base ` s0))‚àß(s2 ‚â† s1 ‚àß s3 ‚â† s1 ‚àß(s2 ‚àà(s1[(Itv ` s0)]s3)‚à® s3 ‚àà(s1[(Itv ` s0)]s2))))}))
comment: Define the function producting the relation "belong to the same half-line" (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Aug-2020.)
